About Me...




Greetings friend:) Have you been wondering about who Xanthe Ravenwolf really is? What makes her tick? How she got to be so incredibly wonderful and also attractive?


What do you mean "No"?.....


Oh well, for all those of you who want to know a little more about me, and for those of you who don't have anything better to do right now, here is a little page just about me.
And for those of you looking for the tailoring section, you're in the wrong place, go back to the main page....:)


 Anyway, about me.


This is me.



Hierophant of our blessed mother Tunare, I am currently of the 61st Sunrise I spend my time on Bertoxxulous server and am currently a member of the most excellent guild Ascending Phoenix.


As far as i can recall, my earliest interest in trade skills was as my ranger, Treye, who was my very first character on my fiance's account. Treye, like a lot of rangers, liked the idea of fletching although that didnt go too well for him, but since that fateful day I have been hooked. Since then I have mastered every trade skill, purely for the love of it, but more than anything else I like to consider myself a Tailor, as it is the one that I love the best (and also hate, as many other tailors may tell you:)


I would like to take the opportunity here to thank my numerous good friends both within and without my guild, just for being good mates. I would also like to thank my RL fiance Rainaer (63rd Sorcerer), for putting up with me spending all evening trolling through vendors and randomly shrieking "Ooh I need that for Tailoring!" while he is hunting stuff, and giving him a heart attack. I also want to thank him for making me the happiest woman alive, and to tell him that I love him more than anything in the world, even EverQuest.

And if you want to be sick, there is a bin in that corner you can use....


For those of you who really want to know, and also so I can keep track of them, my skills are:


Baking 250
Brewing 250
Fletching 250
Jewellery 250
Pottery 250
Smithing 217
Tailoring 250

On Bertoxx I also have several alts who I occasionally play, including a Necro, Warrior, Monk, Enchanter, Ranger and Rogue.


And for those of you who want to know who I really am....


This is me posing.


I am currently 22 years old, a student taking Biology at Sussex University, and living in England. I enjoy roleplaying, wargaming and EverQuest, and also staying in bed until unreasonable hours whenever the opportunity presents itself.


If you have found this site useful, or possibly even entertaining (even if it was only to laugh at my picture), please take a moment to sign the Guestbook and tell me about it, it's the feedback that really does make it all worth the while:) Happy Trade Skills!
